Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Overview for MacOS: Miles on Macintosh

Discussion

The Miles Sound System now supports MacOS! MacOS is strange to develop under - some pieces are advanced, some pieces seem comically backwards. Miles was developed initally on MacOS 9, but all current development is done under MacOS X which is a much, much better environment.

Miles is easy to use and integrate under this platform. This chapter will discuss everything you need to know!
